definitions.definition: A prearranged meeting or assignation , now especially between lovers to meet at a specific place and time.
A market fair, especially a recurring one held on a schedule, where livestock sales took place.

main_definition: A prearranged meeting or assignation , now especially between lovers to meet at a specific place and time.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A mutual agreement, a covenant .
( Scotland , historical ) A market fair, especially a recurring one held on a schedule, where livestock sales took place.
